title: Damon Lindelof on the World-building of ‘Watchmen’ | The Watch
description:
‘Watchmen’ showrunner Damon Lindelof joins the show to talk about why he doesn’t want to be called a creator, but rather a “remixer” (2:55), how he chose which part of the comic book series to reimagine (24:17), and the pilot-making process (48:59).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Damon Lindelof
